channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-5691|2024-09-16T17:58:24.342Z -- intel%20corporation -- 6th%20and%207th%20generation%20intel%20core%20processor%20families%2C%20intel%20xeon%20e3-1500m%20v5%20and%20v6%20processor%20families%2C%20and%20intel%20xeon%20e3-1200%20v5%20and%20v6%20product%20families.
item.description: Incorrect check in Intel processors from 6th and 7th Generation Intel Core Processor Families, Intel Xeon E3-1500M v5 and v6 Product Families, and Intel Xeon E3-1200 v5 and v6 Product Families allows compromised system firmware to impact SGX security via incorrect early system state.

item.title: CVE-2018-12221|2024-09-16T16:32:35.551Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause an integer overflow via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3703|2024-09-16T16:28:06.609Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20ssd%20data%20center%20tool%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper directory permissions in the installer for the Intel(R) SSD Data Center Tool for Windows before v3.0.17 may allow authenticated users to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3645|2024-09-16T16:52:56.704Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20remote%20keyboard
item.description: Escalation of privilege in all versions of the Intel Remote Keyboard allows a local attacker to inject keystrokes into another remote keyboard session.

item.title: CVE-2018-12177|2024-09-16T16:57:52.114Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20proset%2Fwireless%20wifi%20software
item.description: Improper directory permissions in the ZeroConfig service in Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi Software before version 20.90.0.7 may allow an authorized user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5698|2024-09-16T17:38:42.112Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20active%20management%20technology%2C%20intel%20standard%20manageability%2C%20and%20intel%20small%20business%20technology
item.description: Intel Active Management Technology, Intel Standard Manageability, and Intel Small Business Technology firmware versions 11.0.25.3001 and 11.0.26.3000 anti-rollback will not prevent upgrading to firmware version 11.6.x.1xxx which is vulnerable to CVE-2017-5689 and can be performed by a local user with administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-12163|2024-09-16T17:19:16.000Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20iot%20developers%20kit
item.description: A DLL injection vulnerability in the Intel IoT Developers Kit 4.0 installer may allow an authenticated user to potentially escalate privileges using file modification via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5754|2024-09-16T16:48:54.618Z -- intel%20corporation -- most%20modern%20operating%20systems
item.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis of the data cache.

item.title: CVE-2018-12222|2024-09-16T17:59:23.367Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause an out of bound memory read via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3616|2024-09-16T16:53:35.507Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Bleichenbacher-style side channel vulnerability in TLS implementation in Intel Active Management Technology before 12.0.5 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially obtain the TLS session key via the network.

item.title: CVE-2017-5710|2024-09-16T17:58:16.105Z -- intel%20corporation -- trusted%20execution%20engine
item.description: Multiple privilege escalations in kernel in Intel Trusted Execution Engine Firmware 3.0 allows unauthorized process to access privileged content via unspecified vector.

item.title: CVE-2018-12190|2024-09-16T17:54:51.459Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(r) CSME subsystem before versions 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 or Intel(r) TXE before 3.1.60 or 4.0.10 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5699|2024-09-16T17:14:31.514Z -- intel%20corporation -- minnowboard%203
item.description: Input validation error in Intel MinnowBoard 3 Firmware versions prior to 0.65 allow local attacker to cause denial of service via UEFI APIs.

item.title: CVE-2018-12203|2024-09-16T17:44:14.833Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20platform%20sample%20%2F%20silicon%20reference%20firmware
item.description: Denial of service vulnerability in Platform Sample/ Silicon Reference firmware for 8th Generation Intel Core Processor, 7th Generation Intel Core Processor may allow privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12152|2024-09-16T16:58:35.199Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Pointer corruption in Unified Shader Compiler in Intel Graphics Drivers before 10.18.x.5056 (aka 15.33.x.5056), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057) and 20.19.x.5058 (aka 15.40.x.5058) may allow an unauthenticated remote user to potentially execute arbitrary WebGL code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12209|2024-09-16T16:58:34.678Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient access control in User Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to read device configuration information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3669|2024-09-16T16:37:28.540Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20centrino%28r%29%20wireless-n%20and%20intel%28r%29%20centrino%28r%29%20advanced-n%20products%20bluetooth
item.description: A STOP error (BSoD) in the ibtfltcoex.sys driver for Intel Centrino Wireless N and Intel Centrino Advanced N adapters may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially send a malformed L2CAP Connection Request is sent to the Intel Bluetooth device via the network.

item.title: CVE-2017-5694|2024-09-16T17:03:34.241Z -- intel%20corporation -- solid-state%20drive%20professional
item.description: Data corruption vulnerability in firmware in Intel Solid-State Drive Professional PSF104P, PSF109P allows local users to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-12219|2024-09-16T16:53:11.371Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to read memory via local access via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12196|2024-09-16T17:04:17.378Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(R) AMT in Intel(R) CSME before version 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 may allow a privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12173|2024-09-16T16:18:34.131Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20server%20boards%20firmware
item.description: Insufficient access protection in firmware in Intel Server Board, Intel Server System and Intel Compute Module before firmware version 00.01.0014 may allow an unauthenticated attacker to potentially execute arbitrary code resulting in information disclosure, escalation of privilege and/or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12223|2024-09-16T17:42:42.851Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient access control in User Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to escape from a virtual machine guest-to-host via local access.
